actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 61. By unanimous consent.

actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources by unanimous consent
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources by unanimous consent.

official_title: A joint resolution to establish a National Commission on Human Resource Development.
short_title: National Commission on Human Resource Development Act

summary.text: National Commission on Human Resource Development Act - Establishes the National Commission on Human Resource Development. Directs the Commission to establish an independent educational and scientific nonprofit entity, the Center for Human Resource Development, which shall continue its work after the Commission's final report and termination.

titles.title: National Commission on Human Resource Development Act
A joint resolution to establish a National Commission on Human Resource Development.
